name: Dodge'em (UntitledDev_)
description:
What is Dodge'em? 

Dodge'em is an endless runner game, where your goal is to dodge as many obstacles as possible. Points are scored when an obstacle hits the ground, so try to dodge as many as you can to gain a high score! 

How to Play! 

To dodge the obstacles you'll have to use the left and right arrows, and that's about it so have fun!
